amendment.description: Amendment encouraged organizations that apply for the environmental education grant program to describe on their application for Federal grants how they have partnered how they intend to partner with a State or with a local park and recreation department.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 110-854 to add that applicants may describe on their application for federal grant funds how they have partnered, or intend to partner, with a State and local park and recreation department.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Courtney amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
